entry.title: $2550 // "Hot" Lower East Side, 1 Bedroom 1 Bath, Exposed Brick, W/D, D/W
entry.content:
BY OWNER NO FEE

Come experience this HOT newly Gut renovation in the heart of the Lower East Side!

Unit boasts high ceiling, 1 large Bedroom with plenty of closet space, nice sized living room, a marble bathroom, slick finishes, hardwood floors, Chefs Kitchen which includes state of the art stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, modern bathroom fixtures with a laundry facility on the premises! Building also includes a beautiful private backyard, video intercom and Security cameras all throughout!

Pets also allowed! This is a must see!

For a quick showing call Adam at show contact info

entry.content:
57 Pitt Street Apt 13

entry.title: $2380 // Prime location! Downtown XXL 1 bed 1 bath, Exposed brick, W/D
entry.content:
BY OWNER NO FEE!

Prime Location! XXL 1 bed 1 bath gut renovation!

Unit boasts 1 king sized bedroom including large closets for plenty of storage, large living room area, hardwood floors, Marble bathroom, large windows letting in plenty of natural light, high ceilings, European finishes, Chefs kitchen with state of the art stainless steal appliances, granite countertops, and beautiful dark brown cabinetry! Brand new entry way and stairway! Video intercom and security cameras throughout! Laundry facility and virtual dry cleaning service included in the building!

Steps away From Delancey Street, train links, bars, nightlife and restaurants!

Pets allowed!

This is a must see!

For a quick showing contact Adam at show contact info

entry.title: $2295 // Beautiful LES 1BR less than a block from the F train!
entry.content:
Great value! Inviting 1BR LES home! 3 minutes from F train!

- Spacious Queen bedrooms
- 2 Closets and multiple windows in the bedroom
- **Bedroom door has been replaced with a french door
- Surrounded by courtyards; low noise and plenty of sunlight!
- Modern kitchen with SS appliances + dishwasher
- Hardwood floors
- Elegant Exposed brick and deco fireplace
- Plenty of closets for extra storage
- Large living area that fits couch, tv, and dining table
- Freshly tiled bath
- Steps from plenty of parks! Close to wonderful local cafes, restaurants and shops!

Contact me today to schedule a viewing, and find the perfect home!

Call/text: 804-921-2982
Jada Young
Crosstown Apartments
